about_the_game:
Prepare for an experience unlike anything you've seen before... TRATEL64 (spell it in all caps) is a zany comedy adventure game that's stylized like a fever dream! Watch Tratel go from 0 to 64 over the course of an afternoon (in real time that amounts to 1-2 hours).

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



A WILD ADVENTURE– Slice, Snipe, Stab, and Shoot your way through 64 insane targets! Experience the insane (or eccentric if you prefer) personalities of a truly twisted world! There's more than meets the eye here however!

A WIDE ARRAY OF SECRETS – From small little details to short minigames, there's a fair amount of secrets to find in TRATEL64. This game will reward (and rarely punish) those who want to dig deeper.

VULGARITIES GALORE – This is more of a notice of the status of the cleanliness of the entire game, expect many swears, curses, or whatever you feel like they should be called.

Prepare for an experience unlike anything you've seen before... TRATEL64 (spell it in all caps) is a zany comedy adventure game that's stylized like a fever dream! Watch Tratel go from 0 to 64 over the course of an afternoon (in real time that amounts to 1-2 hours).

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



A WILD ADVENTURE– Slice, Snipe, Stab, and Shoot your way through 64 insane targets! Experience the insane (or eccentric if you prefer) personalities of a truly twisted world! There's more than meets the eye here however!

A WIDE ARRAY OF SECRETS – From small little details to short minigames, there's a fair amount of secrets to find in TRATEL64. This game will reward (and rarely punish) those who want to dig deeper.

VULGARITIES GALORE – This is more of a notice of the status of the cleanliness of the entire game, expect many swears, curses, or whatever you feel like they should be called.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Linux Distro Would Do
  • Processor: Any Processor made after 2008
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any video card will work fine
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Lights off, headphones in, during the witching hour.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS Catalina
  • Processor: Any Intel Processor
  • Memory: 450 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 400 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Lights off, headphones in, during the witching hour.

name: TRATEL64

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Any processor made after 2010
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any video card will work fine
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Lights off, headphones in, during the witching hour.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

reviews:
“I wish I could forget Tratel64 so I could experience it for the first time again”
